scripts.prepare: mv src/three.js src/three.browser.js && mv src/three.cjs.js src/three.js ; rollup src/index.js -f es -e three/build/three.module.js | babel --presets env | umd VueGL | babel --presets minify > docs/js/vue-gl.js ; mv src/three.js src/three.cjs.js && mv src/three.browser.js src/three.js
